title: The Celestial

effects: a creature you can see regains hit points equal to the total rolled on the expended d6s
limits: maximum dice spent per use equals your Charisma modifier (minimum 1)

effects: when you cast a spell that deals radiant or fire damage add your Charisma modifier to one damage roll
limits: add Charisma modifier only once per spell

effects: when you finish a long rest choose yourself and up to five creatures
chosen creatures gain temporary hit points equal to your warlock level + your Charisma modifier
limits: temporary hit points last until expended or until the next long rest

effects: you and friendly creatures within 10 ft gain resistance to radiant damage
limits: aura is suppressed while you are incapacitated

feature_defs.trigger: when you are reduced to 0 hit points
effects: regain hit points equal to half your hit point maximum
each enemy within 30 ft takes radiant damage and is blinded until the end of its next turn
limits: if this effect triggers you do not fall unconscious

notes: The Celestial patron emphasizes healing, radiant damage, and protective auras.
Healing Light uses a dedicated d6 pool defined in core resources.
All triggers and limits are expressed in human-readable form (Option A).
